summary: The document details staff payroll records of the HSCA (House Select Committee on Assassinations), focusing on Sheryl Lynn Bonifer's employment and payroll authorizations within the U.S. House of Representatives. It includes her educational background and employment history, alongside the reasons for partial postponement of information release, primarily due to personal privacy concerns such as the redaction of Social Security numbers.
key_findings: Partial postponement of the document's release was due to personal privacy concerns, including the redaction of Social Security numbers.
Sheryl Lynn Bonifer's employment history includes roles in the Office of Finance and the Select Committee on Assassinations within the U.S. House of Representatives.
The document outlines the payroll authorization process within the U.S. House of Representatives.
Details of Bonifer's educational background and government roles highlight her qualifications and contributions.
